widgetType.name: postingentry
widgetType.renderer: !ui-debitcreditlabel negativeCredit:false formatter:$d{!decimalformat precision:%s scale:%s useGrouping:true} style:$s{text-align:right;}

widgetType.name: postingentryneg
widgetType.renderer: !ui-debitcreditlabel negativeCredit:true formatter:$d{!decimalformat precision:%s scale:%s useGrouping:true} style:$s{text-align:right;}

widgetType.name: postingdebitonly
widgetType.renderer: !ui-debitcreditlabel negativeCredit:true formatter:$d{!decimalformat precision:%s scale:%s useGrouping:true} style:$s{text-align:right;}

widgetType.name: postingdebitonlyneg
widgetType.renderer: !ui-debitcreditlabel negativeCredit:false formatter:$d{!decimalformat precision:%s scale:%s useGrouping:true} style:$s{text-align:right;}

widgetType.name: postingcreditonly
widgetType.renderer: !ui-debitcreditlabel negativeCredit:false formatter:$d{!decimalformat precision:%s scale:%s useGrouping:true} style:$s{text-align:right;}

widgetType.name: postingcreditonlyneg
widgetType.renderer: !ui-debitcreditlabel negativeCredit:true formatter:$d{!decimalformat precision:%s scale:%s useGrouping:true} style:$s{text-align:right;}

widgetType.name: alphanumericwithspecial
widgetType.editor: !ui-alphanumeric minLen:%s maxLen:%s trim:%s case:$s{%s} space:true special:true

widgetType.name: alphanumericwithspecialcamel
widgetType.editor: !ui-alphanumeric minLen:%s maxLen:%s trim:%s case:$s{%s} space:true special:true

widgetType.name: alphanumericwithspecialupper
widgetType.editor: !ui-alphanumeric minLen:%s maxLen:%s trim:%s case:$s{%s} space:true special:true

widgetType.name: javafieldname
widgetType.editor: !ui-name minLen:%s maxLen:%s trim:%s underscore:true dollar:true case:CAMEL
